Day 5: 13.9. Presenting the process and prototype
Presentations requirements:
Presentation length 15 min.

The topic/aim, 
The phases you took (with images), 
The results of the interviews,

description: The PowerPoint content covers the benefits of regular exercise for overall health and well-being. It includes information on physical, mental, and emotional benefits of exercise, as well as tips for incorporating exercise into daily routines.
